original_text:
Dragon Spin Pick n Mix
I draghi sono figure leggendarie appartenenti a tutte le culture, occidentali e orientali. Lo ritroviamo nei testi antichi come quelli di Omero, in una favola di Fedro e nell’Apocalisse raccontata nella bibbia. Nella cultura cinese il drago è simbolo di prosperità e fortuna, oltre ad essere legato alla famiglia imperiale. In questa slot i draghi sono custodi di antichi tesori, protetti all’interno di una grotta oscura. Per rendere omaggio a queste splendide creature, la Barcrest ha lavorato parecchio sulla grafica, offrendo un prodotto superlativo dal punto di vista visivo supportato da una musica orientaleggiante che aggiunge pathos al gioco.
Caratteristiche principali
Le linee di gioco fisse sono 20, sistemate su una griglia con 5 rulli e 3 righe. La puntata minima è di 0,10 € per Spin e la massima di 100 €. All’aumentare della puntata crescono anche i 5 Jackpot a disposizione. Prima di cominciare il gioco è possibile scegliere 3 Bonus sui 5 offerti, ognuno con delle funzionalità speciali. La volatilità è alta e il rendimento atteso (RTP) è del 96%.
Simboli e funzionalità di Dragon Spin Pick’n’mix
I simboli di basso valore sono le carte da gioco dal 10 all’Asso, seguiti dai drappi rossi e dai medaglioni. A salire troviamo l’ideogramma, le ghirlande e infine il simbolo della prosperità. La scritta Wild è il nostro Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto quelli Bonus, che sono 5. Prima di iniziare il gioco, ci verrà data la possibilità di sceglierne 3. Per giocare con il bonus poi dovremo trovare 3 simboli Giro Drago. Vediamo i Bonus nel dettaglio:
• Symbol Eliminator: grazie ad esso, vengono assegnati Giri Drago illimitati durante i quali dalla griglia di gioco vengono eliminati i simboli dal valore più basso.
• Fortune Eggs: vengono assegnati 5 Giri Drago durante i quali si dovrà scegliere un uovo della fortuna su 3 proposti, vincendo così un moltiplicatore compreso tra 2 e 50 volte la scommessa.
• Persisting Wilds: anche in questo caso avremo 5 giri drago in omaggio. I simboli Wilds rimarranno fissi sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 e ogni simbolo Wild aggiuntivo ricompenserà con un ulteriore giro gratuito.
• Goliath Reels: in questo caso si avrà diritto a 10 Giri Drago con 3 set di rulli separati da 20 linee di vincita ciascuno. Un simbolo gigante coprirà i 3 rulli centrali.
• Expanding Wilds: 10 Giri Drago assegnati e Wild a espansione, con ogni Wild in più visualizzato che assegna un ulteriore giro drago.
Un ulteriore Bonus è quello denominato Pentola del drago. Durante il gioco regolare può apparire di tanto in tanto una perla che andrà a finire nella pentola posta sopra la griglia di gioco. Con due perle apparse nei rulli 1 e 5 si attiva il bonus che può regalarci un moltiplicatore compreso tra x25 e x500.

raw_translation.response:
Dragon Spin Pick n Mix

Dragons are legendary figures belonging to all cultures, both Western and Eastern. We find them in ancient texts like those of Homer, in a fable by Phaedrus, and in the Apocalypse told in the Bible. In Chinese culture, the dragon is a symbol of prosperity and fortune, as well as being associated with the imperial family. In this slot, dragons are guardians of ancient treasures, protected within a dark cave. To pay tribute to these magnificent creatures, Barcrest has worked hard on the graphics, offering a visually superb product supported by oriental-style music that adds pathos to the game.

Key Features

The fixed game lines are 20, arranged on a grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. The minimum bet is €0.10 per Spin and the maximum is €100. As the bet increases, so do the 5 Jackpots available. Before starting the game, you can choose 3 of the 5 offered bonuses, each with special features. The volatility is high and the expected return (RTP) is 96%.

Symbols and features of Dragon Spin Pick'n'mix

The low-value symbols are the playing cards from 10 to Ace, followed by the red drapes and medallions. Going up, we find the ideogram, the wreaths, and finally, the symbol of prosperity. The word Wild is our Jolly and replaces all symbols except Bonus ones, which are 5. Before starting the game, we will be given the opportunity to choose 3 of them. To play with the bonus, we must then find 3 Dragon Spin symbols. Let's see the bonuses in detail:

• Symbol Eliminator: thanks to it, unlimited Dragon Spin turns are awarded during which the lowest value symbols are removed from the game grid.

• Fortune Eggs: 5 Dragon Spin turns are awarded during which you must choose a lucky egg from 3 proposed, thus winning a multiplier between 2 and 50 times the bet.

• Persisting Wilds: in this case, we will also have 5 free Dragon Spins. Wild symbols will remain fixed on reels 2, 3, and 4, and each additional Wild symbol displayed will reward us with an additional free spin.

• Goliath Reels: in this case, you will be entitled to 10 Dragon Spin turns with 3 sets of reels separated by 20 paylines each. A giant symbol will cover the 3 central reels.

• Expanding Wilds: 10 Dragon Spin turns are assigned and expanding Wilds, with each additional Wild symbol displayed awarding an additional Dragon Spin.

An additional bonus is called the Dragon's Pot. During regular gameplay, a pearl may occasionally appear that will end up in the pot above the game grid. With two pearls appearing on reels 1 and 5, the bonus is activated, which can give us a multiplier between x25 and x500.

Experience the thrill of Dragon Spin Pick n Mix and see if the dragons will favor you with their wealth and prosperity. Good luck!

Review: Dragon Spin Pick n Mix

Dragons are legendary figures belonging to all cultures, Western and Eastern. They can be found in ancient texts such as those of Homer, in a fable by Phaedrus, and in the Apocalypse told in the Bible. In this slot, dragons are the custodians of ancient treasures, protected inside a dark cave. To pay tribute to these splendid creatures, Barcrest has worked tirelessly on the graphics, offering a visually superb product, supported by Oriental music that adds pathos to the game.

Key Features

The fixed game lines are 20, set on a grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. The minimum bet is €0.10 per spin and the maximum bet is €100. As the bet increases, so do the 5 Jackpots available. Before starting the game, it is possible to choose 3 out of the 5 offered Bonus, each with special features. The volatility is high and the expected return (RTP) is 96%.

Symbols and Features of Dragon Spin Pick n Mix

The low-value symbols are the playing cards from 10 to Ace, followed by the red drapes and medallions. Going up we find the ideogram, the garlands and finally the symbol of prosperity. The Wild symbol is our Joker and replaces all symbols except the Bonus ones, of which there are 5. Before starting the game, we will be given the opportunity to choose 3. To play with the bonus, we must then find 3 Dragon Spin symbols. Let's see the Bonuses in detail:

- Symbol Eliminator: thanks to this, unlimited Dragon Spin will be assigned during which the lowest value symbols will be eliminated from the game grid.
- Fortune Eggs: 5 Dragon Spin will be assigned during which you will have to choose one of the three fortune eggs offered, winning a multiplier ranging from 2 to 50 times the bet.
- Persisting Wilds: also in this case, we will have 5 Dragon Spin gifts. The Wilds symbols will remain fixed on reels 2, 3, and 4, and each additional Wild symbol displayed will reward with an additional free spin.
- Goliath Reels: in this case, you will be entitled to 10 Dragon Spin with 3 sets of reels separated by 20 winning lines each. A giant symbol will cover the 3 central reels.
- Expanding Wilds: 10 Dragon Spin assigned and expanding Wilds, with each additional displayed Wild symbol assigning an additional Dragon Spin.

An additional Bonus is called the Dragon Pot. During regular gameplay, a pearl may occasionally appear that will end up in the pot placed above the game grid. With two pearls appearing on reels 1 and 5, the bonus is activated, which can give us a multiplier ranging from x25 to x500.

To add to the excitement, occasional pearls will appear, adding to the Dragon Pot located above the game grid. With two pearls appearing on reels 1 and 5, you can trigger the Dragon Pot Bonus feature and potentially earn a multiplier of up to x500.

With stunning graphics and Oriental-infused music, Barcrest has created a visually impressive game sure to transport you to a world filled with legendary dragons and their treasures. Review: Dragon Spin Pick n Mix

Dragons are legendary figures belonging to all cultures, Western and Eastern. They can be found in ancient texts such as those of Homer, in a fable by Phaedrus, and in the Apocalypse told in the Bible. In Chinese culture, the dragon is a symbol of prosperity and fortune, as well as being linked to the imperial family. In this slot, dragons are the custodians of ancient treasures, protected inside a dark cave. To pay tribute to these splendid creatures, Barcrest has worked tirelessly on the graphics, offering a visually superb product, supported by Oriental music that adds pathos to the game.

Key Features

The fixed game lines are 20, set on a grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. The minimum bet is €0.10 per spin and the maximum bet is €100. As the bet increases, so do the 5 Jackpots available. Before starting the game, it is possible to choose 3 out of the 5 offered Bonus, each with special features. The volatility is high and the expected return (RTP) is 96%.

Symbols and Features of Dragon Spin Pick n Mix

The low-value symbols are the playing cards from 10 to Ace, followed by the red drapes and medallions. Going up we find the ideogram, the garlands and finally the symbol of prosperity. The Wild symbol is our Joker and replaces all symbols except the Bonus ones, of which there are 5. Before starting the game, we will be given the opportunity to choose 3. To play with the bonus, we must then find 3 Dragon Spin symbols. Let's see the Bonuses in detail:

- Symbol Eliminator: thanks to this, unlimited Dragon Spin will be assigned during which the lowest value symbols will be eliminated from the game grid.
- Fortune Eggs: 5 Dragon Spin will be assigned during which you will have to choose one of the three fortune eggs offered, winning a multiplier ranging from 2 to 50 times the bet.
- Persisting Wilds: also in this case, we will have 5 Dragon Spin gifts. The Wilds symbols will remain fixed on reels 2, 3, and 4, and each additional Wild symbol displayed will reward with an additional free spin.
- Goliath Reels: in this case, you will be entitled to 10 Dragon Spin with 3 sets of reels separated by 20 winning lines each. A giant symbol will cover the 3 central reels.
- Expanding Wilds: 10 Dragon Spin assigned and expanding Wilds, with each additional displayed Wild symbol assigning an additional Dragon Spin.

An additional Bonus is called the Dragon Pot. During regular gameplay, a pearl may occasionally appear that will end up in the pot placed above the game grid. With two pearls appearing on reels 1 and 5, the bonus is activated, which can give us a multiplier ranging from x25 to x500.

Experienced Gamblers Translation:

Venture into the mystical realm of dragons and uncover the treasures hidden within their dark lair in Dragon Spin Pick n Mix. With 20 fixed game lines spread across a 5x3 grid, the minimum bet of €0.10 per spin and maximum bet of €100 make this slot game approachable for all types of players.

Choose 3 out of the 5 offered bonuses before starting to unlock special features that can significantly increase your winnings. The high volatility and expected return (RTP) of 96% offer experienced gamblers the thrill of high stakes gambling. Wild symbols will replace all others except for the bonus symbols, ramping up the excitement and chances of hitting it big. Whether you prefer unlimited Dragon Spins, multiplier rewards, persisting Wilds, Goliath reels, or expanding Wilds, there's a Bonus feature that will suit your style of play.

To add to the excitement, occasional pearls will appear, adding to the Dragon Pot located above the game grid. With two pearls appearing on reels 1 and 5, you can trigger the Dragon Pot Bonus feature and potentially earn a multiplier of up to x500.

With stunning graphics and Oriental-infused music, Barcrest has created a visually impressive game sure to transport you to a world filled with legendary dragons and their treasures. Enjoy the thrill of the hunt, rollick in the stacks of gold, and let the Dragon Spin Pick n Mix guide your path to victory.
